attributes.action: For all E.U Nationals who have been sentenced by the UK courts to serve their sentence in FULL in their own countries.
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition for ALL E.U Nationals to serve their sentences in FULL once deported back to their Homeland.
The U.K Justice System has sentenced and Judges have set tariffs that should not be reduced by deportation because their countries do not recognise our tariffs that have been put in place by the severity of the crime.
